Author: livipup
Text: Try reminding yourself that you're underweight which means you are objectively not fat.

Author: quietlyinteresting
Text: OK first thing you don’t have to go to a Christmas party. Just do like me mention you have a prior engagement. A Wedding, best friends’ birthday, BF’s or GF’s thing that night, family or friends from out of town Etc. You have the control, you don’t have to go. No matter how much people find the need to remind you “it’s going to be great.” Cause remember there your colleagues not your friends. You choose your friends not your colleagues.  Short term with panic attacks put your tongue to the roof of your mouth and breath through you nose. The tongue on the roof of your mouth will relax your jaw. Count your breaths. When you loose count start again.   Long term try talking it out group helped for me. Hope I could help.
